EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Open House & DTF_London_Q316.Reminder 9-12-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal Digital Transformation Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/london]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for tomorrow's Digital Transformation Forum in London, where you'll hear from VW and Orange as they share experiences of their journey to a digital business. See event details below:
Date: 13 September 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date!}} Time: 9h00 to 17h00 Location: Pivotal, The Warehouse, 211 Old Street, 2nd Floor, London EC1V 9NR Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal+Software/@51.52618,-0.0907994,17z/data=!4m8!1m2!2m1!1sPivotal,+The+Warehouse,+211+Old+Street,+2nd+Floor,+London+EC1V+9NR!3m4!1s0x48761ca88321b72b:0xaa6a161c1fc6539d!8m2!3d51.526386!4d-0.089071]]>
AGENDA <[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/london]]>
Getting to Reception Scaffolding obscures sightlines to The Warehouse from the Old Street Roundabout, but if you persevere through the building site, youâ€™ll find us!
Step-by-Step Directions
- Come out of Subway 4 from Old Street Tube Station - Walk up the ramp on your left - Immediately in front of you there is white boarding with "Ceviche" and "Maki" advertised, walk past this to the right into a mini courtyard - The revolving doors for our building are immediately on your left - Enter the building, walk down to your right past the coffee shop and you will find the elevators at the end; we are on the 2nd floor
Change in plans? If you are no longer able to attend the forum, please reply to this message to let us know so that your spot can be released to the waiting list.
We look forward to meeting you soon!
The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact Phil Reay at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>.
